attributes.action: halt plans to cancel Doctor Who on the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reports suggest Doctor Who is to be cancelled due to the current writer unable to keep up with the current workload.
As the BBC is publically funded, Doctor Who is the only show on TV worth watching, and the only reason to pay for a TV licence.
Rather than cancel Doctor Who, They should start the search for new writers and keep Doctor Who for future generations.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
